```{r, include=FALSE}
# Data Wrangling
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)

# Graphics
library(ggplot2)

# Geographic
library(sf)
library(sidrar)
library(geobr)
```


```{r}
a <- cattle_sales_census %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>% 
  mutate(average_price = sales_value_big_slaughter/heads_sold_big_slaughter) %>% 
  drop_na(average_price) 

```


```{r}
print("Big slaughter")
summary(a$average_price)
```


```{r}
a %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = average_price)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "grey", color = "white", bins = 30) +
  labs(title = "Local price Distribution (in R$ 1000)", 
       x = "Values", 
       y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal()
```
